author: Gregory Stopka
text:
I have an Alliance member that is seeking the most efficient vehicle to purchase for Animal Control usage.  Any information/research on Animal Control Vehicles?  I need to know what type of vehicle would be an optimal and efficient purchase: truck or van.  
There are a few factors they are trying to determine:
1).  What type of vehicle is primarily purchased by local governments?  
2). The purchased vehicle would have to have a special hydraulic-lift bucket to help the officers lift animals.  Which is most effective in handling this device?  
3). Which vehicle would be the easiest to clean?
title: Animal Control Vehicles
